resources.string: The Account ID is optional. If specified, it is transmitted as a login_hint parameter in the authorization request.

Correspondent would like to turn the video on
Call has been paused by remote.
Click on play button to resume it.
This assistant will help you configure and use your SIP account.
What will my phone number be used for?

Your friends will find you more easily if you link your account to your phone number

You will see in your address book who is using &appName; and your friends will know that they can reach you on &appName; as well.

You can only use your phone number with one &appName; account.\n\nIf you had already linked your number to an other account but you prefer to use this one, simply link it now and your number will automatically be moved to this account.

Some features require a &appName; account, such as group messaging or ephemeral messaging.

These features are hidden when you register with a third party SIP account.

To enable it in a commercial project, please contact us.
To create an account using your email:

Your device doesn\'t seem to be able to receive push notifications.\n\nAs we now require them for the account creation process, you won\'t be able to create an account inside the app, but you can create it on our website:
There is already an account using this number
Account does not exist or password does not match
Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number
Please enter your &appName; account username and password
Use your username and password instead of your phone number
Please enter your username and password with your SIP domain
Please enter a username, email and password for your &appName; account
Your account is created. Please check your emails to validate your account:
Once it is done, come back here and click on the button.
We have sent you an SMS with a validation code to your phone number:
To complete your phone number verification, please enter the 4 digit code below:\n
You will link with your phone number the following username:
Your account has not been activated yet, please click on the link you received by email
Unknown URL format, can\'t download provisioning‚Ä¶
Failed to download or apply remote provisioning profile‚Ä¶
Please input your password below to access the settings

Shows a notification to keep the app alive

Do not edit unless you know what you are doing!
Once enabled it can\'t be disabled!

Will use one server for upload and another one for download
Example: john if your account is john@sip.example.org

Example: sip.example.org if your account is john@sip.example.org

Apply prefix for outgoing calls and chat
If a number is entered, apply prefix to number
Do you want to delete your account?
Your account will only be deleted locally.\nTo delete it permanently, go on your SIP provider website.
Your account will only be deleted locally.\nTo delete it permanently, go to our account management platform:
To raise the security level, you can check the following codes with your correspondent.

Instant messages are end-to-end encrypted in secured conversations. It is possible to upgrade the security level of a conversation by authenticating participants. To do so, call the contact and follow the authentication process.
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
